livingstoneonline/onemorevoice.name: livingstoneonline/onemorevoice
livingstoneonline/onemorevoice.desc: This is the repository for One More Voice. One More Voice, a work of digital humanities scholarship, focuses on recovering non-European contributions from nineteenth-century British imperial and colonial archives. The name reflects the fact that there is always one more voice to recover from the archives.
